changeSet.author: typography
changeSet.createView: SELECT CT.ID TYPE_ID, TYPE TYPE_NAME, CI.ID ITEM_ID, ITEM ITEM_NAME, CP.ID PROPERTY_ID, PROPERTY_NAME PROPERTY_NAME, CPV.ID VALUE_ID, CPV.PROPERTY_VALUE VALUE_VALUE FROM CONSUMABLE_TYPES CT LEFT JOIN CONSUMABLE_ITEMS CI on CT.ID = CI.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN CONSUMABLE_PROPERTIES CP on CT.ID = CP.TYPE_ID LEFT JOIN CONSUMABLE_PROPERTIES_VALUES CPV on CP.ID = CPV.PROPERTY_ID and CPV.ITEM_ID = CI.ID ORDER BY CT.TYPE, CI.ITEM, CPV.PROPERTY_VALUE
